backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing authorization, user profiles, guardian PIN, child profiles, and alarm event/state management with AccessControl enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level requirements to frontend files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten oneâ€‘sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and root layout with automatic profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Alarm/PinAcknowl: Form for verifying the guardian PIN and acknowledging an active alarm via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial guardian profile creation, submitting name and role to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/AlarmEv: Displays a scrollable list of alarm and access events, showing child names, timestamps, and acknowledgment status.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/ChildPr: Provides UI to create, rename, archive, and list child profiles using related backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Guardia: Allows guardians to set or change their PIN with validation and server-side mutation.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Princip: Enables linking and unlinking Internet Identity principals to child profiles with validation and backend calls.
Defines the main application layout, navigation, header, footer, and auto-redirects if an alarm is active.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarm.ts: Provides hooks to query alarm status and trigger or acknowledge alarms while updating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarmEvent: Fetches alarm event history from the backend using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChildProfi: Contains hooks to fetch, create, rename, and archive child profiles with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Exposes hooks for fetching and saving the current user profile and checking user roles.
frontend/src/pages/LimitationsPrivacy.ts: React page showing cards that explain web app limitations and privacy assurances, especially that no biometrics are collected and Internet Identity is used.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, layout, keyframes, and plugin usage for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architectural notes, known issues, required images, and a list of existing implemented features.
